item.title: AWK - forgotten data engineering tool
item.description: Intro This post is dedicated to AWK. Despite the title AWK is not totally forgotten but still many data scientists and engineers have never heard of it. Since 1977 many things have changed in the data world, especially the scale, but in my opinion it’s still relevant and useful tool in 2022. What is AWK AWK is a tiny, domain-specific language for text processing. It can be used via awk program which is usually available on UNIX-like systems out of the box.
